issues.description: Potential bug: timestamp uses 'payload.iat || Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000)' which would incorrectly override payload.iat if it's explicitly set to 0 (a valid timestamp)
Syntax issue: Unnecessary double parentheses in error message template literal
Syntax issue: Unnecessary double parentheses in error message template literal
Potential issue: Using splice with array length as index to append elements is unclear and could be replaced with push or concat
Syntax issue: Unnecessary double parentheses in error message template literal
Syntax issue: Unnecessary double parentheses in error message template literal
Potential bug: Algorithm selection based on key type doesn't explicitly handle all possible asymmetricKeyType values, defaulting to PUB_KEY_ALGS which might not be appropriate
UX issue: When reporting an invalid issuer error with an array of issuers, it shows the array object representation rather than a formatted list
